description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              We are looking for an enthusiastic, dynamic marketing assistant to join our marketing department and provide creative ideas & support to help achieve company’s goals.
              

              Digital Marketing
              
              •	Content developing:  creating attractive content to the target audience in a regular basis
              
              •	Web administration:  update company’s news, PR blogs, Workshop images to Website
              
              •	Social media: support in developing & managing company social media channel (Facebook, Google+, Instagram, Youtube)
              
              •	Email Marketing:  create innovative idea to catch customer attention, improve Click Through Rate
              

              Traditional Marketing
              
              •	Event Coordination: Help organizing & supporting in company workshops, marketing events
              
              •	Other administrative works and working with external agencies (printing, filming, advertising) when needed
              
              •	Co-operate with internal sales team to come up with promotion ideas
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              •	At least 1 year experience in a marketing position
              
              •	Bachelor Degree in Marketing, Communication or relevant field
              
              •	Good verbal & writing skills in both English and Vietnamese (TOEIC: 650 or above, IELTS 5.0 or above)
              
              •	Strong organizational and time management skills
              
              •	Proficient in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, Power Point)
              
              •	Have Graphic Design Skill is a plus (Photoshop, AI)
              

              Salary - Regulation - Benefits
              
              •	8,000,000 – 9,000,000 vnd / month for a full-time position (based on skills & experience)
              
              •	Working day: Monday to Friday (8g30 – 17g)
              
              •	13th month salary, Team bonus, Insurance, Annual Review, Training and Development
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
